title: Introducing the ChatGPT app for iOS
summary: OpenAI has launched the ChatGPT app for iOS, allowing users to access the ChatGPT language model on their iPhones. The app is free to use and offers features such as instant answers, tailored advice, creative inspiration, professional input, and learning opportunities. ChatGPT Plus subscribers will have access to additional capabilities and faster response times. The app is currently available in the US and will expand to other countries soon. OpenAI is also working on bringing the app to Android devices.
